channel.title: Applying RuneScape Website Template to a Website?
channel.description:
I'm really good with Java, but I'm clueless with all this website stuff. I just got the RuneScape 2007 Website Template (174 mB), but I have no idea what to do with it, or how to apply it to my website. So I went to 000webhost.com and signed up, then I went to "1 Click Website Restore!" because their Support Noobs told me to do that to apply my website template, so that little loading bar that looks like a grey candy cane kept on rolling, and rolling, and loading, but it didn't finish. I let it run all night, until I saw the text below it:
50mb MAX is what you can upload here, if it's bigger, use the FTP Uploader.
*megaexetremefacepalm* I could have been watching porn or something on that instead of waiting for this crap to load, and it didn't even load!
So then I tried the FTP Uploader, and it didn't work.
Anyway, now I'm asking you. How do I apply this template to a website?

item.title: Applying RuneScape Website Template to a Website?
item.dc:creator: @TiVo TiVo
item.description:
@TiVo wrote:

I’m really good with Java, but I’m clueless with all this website stuff. I just got the RuneScape 2007 Website Template (174 mB), but I have no idea what to do with it, or how to apply it to my website. So I went to 000webhost.com and signed up, then I went to “1 Click Website Restore!” because their Support Noobs told me to do that to apply my website template, so that little loading bar that looks like a grey candy cane kept on rolling, and rolling, and loading, but it didn’t finish. I let it run all night, until I saw the text below it:

50mb MAX is what you can upload here, if it’s bigger, use the FTP Uploader.

megaexetremefacepalm
I could have been watching porn or something on that instead of waiting for this crap to load, and it didn’t even load!

So then I tried the FTP Uploader, and it didn’t work.

Anyway, now I’m asking you. How do I apply this template to a website?
